ai-thag1.10:1.1_0: A knowledge master, peaceful and self-controlled,
ai-thag1.10:1.2_0: is rid of concern for this world and the world beyond.
ai-thag1.10:1.3_0: Undefiled in regard to all things,
ai-thag1.10:1.4_0: they’d know the arising and passing of the world.
ai-thag1.10:1.5_0: That is how this verse was recited by the senior venerable Puṇṇamāsa.
ai-thag1.10:1.6_0: The first sub-chapter on lying down is finished.
ai-thag1.10:2.2_0: (Whoever) like a hook from a doubt,
ai-thag1.10:2.4_0: and the cool shade of the cool water.
